this_title: The Brilliant World of Tom Gates Season 3
trans_title: 涂鸦小天才汤姆·盖茨 第三季
introduction: Tom Gates returns for more adventures! Have fun with Tom's friends and family, rock out to epic songs and play amazing games.The Brilliant World of Tom Gates combines 2D and stop-motion animation with live action. It blends Tom’s humor and school life with crafting ideas that kids can recreate. Season three will see Tom embark on more adventures at home and school with his friends and family.
chinese_title: 涂鸦小天才汤姆·盖茨 第三季
foreign_title: The Brilliant World of Tom Gates Season 3
